content: Last night, the stars in the night sky gave me... a hunch about a surprise, my home, and black tea. And today, here you are, at my home.

content: Relax, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>. {A笑眯眯}Feel free to make yourself at home. Can I offer you some black tea?

content: {A思考星光}Lately, I've been experimenting with a new black tea blend at home. It has the aroma of coffee, yet remains black tea. Would you... like to try it?
